prompts.prompt: Hey there! What’s something cool you noticed today?
What’s one thing you’re excited to do today?
Did anything tricky come up today?
How did you handle the tricky stuff?
What’s the best thing that happened today?
Can you remember a time when you felt really happy? What happened?
Who is someone that made a big difference in your life? How did they help you?
What’s a memory from a long time ago that you still think about? Why do you think it’s important?
Have you ever faced a challenge before today that taught you something important? What was it?
Is there a special place you like to remember? What makes it special to you?
